summary: Work in Progress: Conjuration perk changes allowing more summons and ways to improve your summons. Your Familiar can now level with you.
descriptionHtml:
Requires Dawnguard.

More changes are to come but I would like some feed back. All of the changes are done to the actors and perks. I have also messed with the familiar spell itself.

Pretty much everything is self explanatory in game and I hope you enjoy it.
author: Darg727
